slides.author: Alexey Grigorev
slides.title: What does an AI engineer role look like today?
slides.subtitle: Job descriptions are often abstract. Interviews and tasks reveal the actual expectations.

slides.title: What I'm working with
slides.body: So far I've collected over 250 job descriptions and dozens of real repositories related to AI engineering work.

slides.title: What I'm analyzing
slides.body: How companies hire AI engineers, what they ask in interviews, what take-home assignments look like, and which skills are evaluated in practice.

slides.title: Adding real interview experience
slides.body: To complement this data, I'm gathering input from people who have recently interviewed for AI engineer roles.

slides.supportingText: I'll publish patterns and observations from this work in my newsletter.
